message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could you consider selling it to me for $100?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I've got to make a living too! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than $100. How about $115?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'll do my best to stay within my budget. Can we agree on $105 for the product?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $105, but I'm still not making a huge profit. Can you meet me at $110, and we can call it a deal?
